trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionListCollection class represents the aggregation of all the items in a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: A classe DesignerActionListCollection representa a agregação de todos os itens no painel de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionListCollection class contains zero or more <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: A classe DesignerActionListCollection contém zero ou mais <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: Each of these lists contains zero or more objects that represent the actual items in the panel and are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Cada uma dessas listas contém zero ou mais objetos que representam os itens reais no painel e são derivados da <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>classe</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> de

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the two techniques for supplying a DesignerActionListCollection to populate the panel with items for components, including custom controls.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra duas técnicas para fornecer um DesignerActionListCollection para preencher o painel com itens de componentes, incluindo controles personalizados.

trans-unit.source: |Technique|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |Pull model|The designer for the component class, which is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> class, supplies this collection through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Técnica | Descrição | |---------------|-----------------| | Modelo de pull | O designer para a classe do componente, que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>da classe, fornece esta coleção por meio de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The designer infrastructure reads this property when it must display the panel.| |Push model|A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> or DesignerActionListCollection is supplied as a parameter in a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> associated with the component.| The designer infrastructure constructs a panel by creating a smart tag panel, whose constructor takes two parameters of type DesignerActionListCollection.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de designer lê essa propriedade quando ele deve exibir o painel. | | Modelo de push | Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>ou DesignerActionListCollection for fornecida como um parâmetro em uma chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>método o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>associado ao componente. | A infraestrutura de designer constrói um painel com a criação de um painel de marcas inteligentes, cujo construtor obtém dois parâmetros de tipo DesignerActionListCollection.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The collections of lists, which contain the pulled and pushed items, are merged into one panel.
trans-unit.target: As coleções de listas que contêm os itens desconectados e enviadas por push, são mescladas em um painel.

trans-unit.source: Because it derives from the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase?displayProperty=fullName> class, DesignerActionListCollection uses an internal <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> to store its collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Porque deriva do <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase?displayProperty=fullName>classe DesignerActionListCollection usa interno <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>para armazenar sua coleção de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> class with default settings.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> classe com as configurações padrão.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionListCollection constructor creates an empty collection, containing zero <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: O construtor DesignerActionListCollection cria uma coleção vazia, que contém zero <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> class with the specified panel items.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> classe com os itens do painel especificado.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionListCollection constructor creates a collection that contains the supplied <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: O construtor DesignerActionListCollection cria uma coleção que contém fornecido <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects to populate the collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> objetos para preencher a coleção.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Adds the supplied <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona fornecido <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> à coleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The new element is added to the end of the internal list.
trans-unit.target: O elemento novo é adicionado ao final da lista interna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element is inserted into the collection's internal list.
trans-unit.target: A posição na qual o novo elemento é inserido em lista interna da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds the elements of the supplied <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> array to the end of the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona os elementos da fornecido <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> matriz ao final da coleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The new elements are added to the end of the internal list.
trans-unit.target: Os novos elementos são adicionados ao final da lista interna.

trans-unit.source: After validating the `value` parameter, the AddRange method makes a series of calls to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.Add%2A> method to individually add each element.
trans-unit.target: Depois de validar o `value` parâmetro, o método AddRange faz uma série de chamadas para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.Add%2A>método para adicionar individualmente cada elemento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects to add.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> objetos para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Adds the elements of the supplied <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> to the end of the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona os elementos da fornecido <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> ao final da coleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The new elements are added to the end of the internal list.
trans-unit.target: Os novos elementos são adicionados ao final da lista interna.

trans-unit.source: After validating the `value` parameter, the AddRangemethod makes a series of calls to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.Add%2A> method to individually add each element.
trans-unit.target: Depois de validar o `value` parâmetro, o AddRangemethod faz com que uma série de chamadas para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.Add%2A>método para adicionar individualmente cada elemento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the collection contains a specific value.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a coleção contém um valor específico.

trans-unit.source: A match is determined by value, not identity, comparison.
trans-unit.target: Uma correspondência é determinada pelo valor, não identidade, a comparação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> para pesquisar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection contains the specified value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a coleção contiver o valor especificado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the current collection into the supplied array, starting at the specified array index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos da coleção atual para a matriz fornecida, começando no índice de matriz especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the CopyTo method throws an exception while copying, the state of the destination array is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Se o método CopyTo lança uma exceção durante a cópia, o estado da matriz de destino é indefinido.

trans-unit.source: For example, if an <xref:System.ArgumentException> or <xref:System.InvalidCastException> occurs, the destination array may be left in a partially filled state.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.ArgumentException>ou <xref:System.InvalidCastException>ocorre, a matriz de destino poderão ser deixada em um estado parcialmente preenchido.</xref:System.InvalidCastException> </xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz unidimensional do tipo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> que é o destino dos elementos copiados da coleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: A matriz deve ter indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `array` no qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayé multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the current collection is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o número de elementos na coleção atual é maior que o espaço disponível do index ao final da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: A problem occurred casting the elements of the current collection to the type of the destination array, perhaps as the result of a failed downcast.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um problema ao converter os elementos da coleção atual para o tipo da matriz de destino, talvez como resultado de uma falha baixá-los.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specific item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina o índice de um item específico na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class uses a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> to contain its collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>classe usa um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>para conter sua coleção de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> localizar na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of value if found in the internal list; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice do value encontrado na lista interna; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the supplied <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> into the collection at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Insere fornecido <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> na coleção na posição especificada.

trans-unit.source: If the `index` parameter is equal to the value of the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property, the new element is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o `index` parâmetro for igual ao valor da <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>propriedade, o novo elemento é adicionado ao final da coleção.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class uses a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> to contain its collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>classe usa um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>para conter sua coleção de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: Because lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: Como listas mantêm elementos contíguos, os elementos que seguem o ponto de inserção se mover para baixo para acomodar o novo elemento.

trans-unit.source: This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the insertion point.
trans-unit.target: Essa reorganização altera o índice dos elementos após o ponto de inserção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual `value` devem ser inseridos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> a ser inserido na coleção.

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0 or greater than the count of elements in the current collection.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que 0 ou maior que a contagem de elementos na coleção atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o elemento no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Setting an element to `null` causes a design-time exception to be thrown when the smart tag panel is displayed.
trans-unit.target: A definição de um elemento como `null` faz com que uma exceção de tempo de design para ser gerada quando o painel de marcas inteligentes é exibido.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Executa processos personalizados adicionais ao limpar o conteúdo do <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before inserting a new element into the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Executa processos personalizados adicionais antes de inserir um novo elemento para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert `value`.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual inserir `value`.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the element at `index`.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do elemento no `index`.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes when removing an element from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Executa processos personalizados adicionais ao remover um elemento do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` can be found.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual `value` pode ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the element to remove from `index`.
trans-unit.target: O valor do elemento a ser removido do `index`.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before setting a value in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Executa processos personalizados adicionais antes de um valor de configuração de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `oldValue` can be found.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual `oldValue` pode ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The value to replace with `newValue`.
trans-unit.target: O valor para substituir `newValue`.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the element at `index`.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do elemento no `index`.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes when validating a value.
trans-unit.target: Executa processos personalizados adicionais ao validar um valor.

trans-unit.source: The object to validate.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para validar.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove a primeira ocorrência de um determinado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class uses a <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> to contain its collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>classe usa um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>para conter sua coleção de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: Since lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the removal point move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: Já que listas mantêm elementos contíguos, os elementos que seguem o ponto de remoção mover para cima para ocupar o ponto vagas.

trans-unit.source: This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the removal point.
trans-unit.target: Essa reorganização altera o índice dos elementos após o ponto de remoção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to remove from the current collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> para remover da coleção atual.
